categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook fiction

nodes.text: Partners No More is a short story appearing in the June 1996 Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook, written by Peter M. Schweighofer for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.

After failing to capture the Jedi Luke Skywalker and the lucrative bounty placed on his head, Barabel bounty hunter Skahtul confronts fellow hunter Calliose the Kajain'sa'Nikto, who is wanted by the Klatooinian Trade Guild for prior offenses. Angry at Calliose for his own part in Skywalker's failed capture, Skahtul decides to collect the reward on the Nikto as a consolation prize.
